title: Dataset for Room-Temperature 181Ta(TiO2): An e-γ TDPAC Study
abstract:
Dataset for room temperature e-γ and γ-γ 181Ta(TiO2) TDPAC spectroscopy as submitted to “Room-Temperature 181Ta(TiO2): An e-γ TDPAC Study”, alongside the programs used for data extraction and analysis

Take note that additional instructions are needed to operate the programs included inside this repository. It is wise to send an email to J.G Correia (joao@cern.ch) or me to get said additional instructions. Best,
Ian Yap Chang Jie iany0003@e.ntu.edu.sg GFIT19 is based upon: "J.G.Correia for GFIT19 and N. P. Barradas for core NNFIT programs (PAC MANual, Lisbon (1992), and N. P. Barradas, M. Rots, A. A. Melo, and J. C. Soares, Physical Review B 47, 8763 (1993). The programs and manuals are freely shared upon request to J.G. Correia: joao@cern.ch.” Nightmare is based upon: Nightmare (MDI), Version RC 3 (1.2.0.247); Copyright (2005–2010) from the group Reiner Vianden and (2008–2010) Ronan Nédélec; Bonn University, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, 2010. Interlude is based upon: Horta, J.; Silva, D. Interlude, Copyright (2000–2002) from Leipzig University © JL.

source.display_name: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
